heading: death online
subheading: photographs of an executed man posted on a florida court web site have attracted so much attention, its web server has repeatedly crashed under the load of viewers. the photographs of convicted murderer allen lee davis shortly after his electrocution on 8 july have elicited both praise and criticism for florida's highest court. the photos were posted by state supreme court justice leander shaw as part of his dissenting opinion against a ruling upholding the constitutionality of the electric chair.
author: wired staff
text: photographs of an executed man posted on a florida court web site have attracted so much attention, its web server has repeatedly crashed under the load of viewers. the photographs of convicted murderer allen lee davis shortly after his electrocution on 8 july have elicited both praise and criticism for florida's highest court. the photos were posted by state supreme court justice leander shaw as part of his dissenting opinion on a ruling upholding the constitutionality of the electric chair. more from lycos
